author: pietroGru
body:
For the [pull/47629](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47629), following up the [comment](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47629#issuecomment-3674754150) from @mmusich .

Please notice that one may want to merge this one after [pull/47629](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47629) has been actually merged.
title: Add new SiStripClusterSoA, SiStripDigiSoA packages
